name: slide_SDTM_to_BCs
query: match(domain:Domain)-[r1]->(var:Variable)-[r2]->(crm:CRMNode)<-[r3]-(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r4]-(bc:BiomedicalConcept) where domain.name in ['VS','AE'] and crm.sdtm='--LOC' RETURN *

name: slide_dataContact
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN *

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN *

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance_Timeline
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance)where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] OPTIONAL MATCH(sai)-[r4]->(epoch:StudyEpoch),(sai)-[r5]->(encounter:Encounter),(sai)<-[r6]-(timeline:ScheduleTimeline)-[r7]->(timing:Timing)-[r8]->(sai) RETURN *

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance_Screen1
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN *

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance_Screen1_with_data
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] OPTIONAL MATCH (dc)<-[r4]-(dp:DataPoint)-[r5]->(subj:Subject) RETURN *
